hooks.command: echo "[HOOK] About to modify files. Creating backup..." && mkdir -p "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR/.claude/backups/$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S)" && find "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" -name '*.py' -o -name '*.js' -o -name '*.ts' -o -name '*.json' -o -name '*.md' | grep -v '.claude' | head -10 | xargs -I {} cp {} "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR/.claude/backups/$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S)/" 2>/dev/null || true

echo "[HOOK] File modification complete. Running syntax checks..." && if [ -f "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR/package.json" ]; then cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" && npm run lint 2>/dev/null || echo "No lint script found"; elif find "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" -name '*.py' | head -1 | grep -q .; then cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" && python -m py_compile **/*.py 2>/dev/null || echo "Python syntax check complete"; fi
echo "[HOOK] Git commit detected. Running pre-commit validations..." && cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" && git diff --cached --name-only | head -5 | xargs -I {} echo "Modified: {}"
